etymology.description: The word 钱包(錢包) (qiánbāo) is a compound word which combines 钱(錢) (qián, "money") and 包(包) (bāo, "bag"). The combination literally means a 'money bag', which refers to a wallet.
etymology.interpretation: Combining 钱(錢) (qián, "money") and 包(包) (bāo, "bag"), 钱包(錢包) signifies a container or pouch for carrying money, fitting the modern concept of a wallet.

examples.chinese: 我丢了钱包(我丟了錢包)。
今天出门时(今天出門時)，我发现钱包不见了(我發現錢包不見了)。
examples.pinyin: Jīntiān chūmén shí, wǒ fāxiàn qiánbāo bùjiàn le.
examples.english: Today when leaving home, I discovered that my wallet was missing.
